name: OpenFlower
description:
Visual novel. The action of which takes place in a small Japanese family. Just moved to a big city full of surprises and adult adventures. You have to plunge into the life of an unemployed husband and his beautiful wife. Your choices will help her grow in the company. You can influence her promiscuity, depravity and communication skills with other men. The game develops around the Hot Wife fetish. Most of the scenes in it can be classified by the NTR tag. If you like this idea, you will definitely love the game. Can you make your Hot Wife open for the new adventures as a flower?

The game and game images are in 1920*1080 format. The format is scalable. The quality of the pictures will pleasantly surprise you with a stylized cartoon photo realistic look. The characters have their own character, change throughout the story and develop along with the main character.

The original language is English. The game is fully translated into Spanish and Hindi. It contains a video, soundtrack, a story that continues for a month and has several endings that depend on your choice. At the moment, the game is represented by version 1.17 and is fully completed.
